title: Minecraft killer
summary: I'm going to try to make a Minecraft killer
content:
I've been thinking that Minecraft has become garbage and that there should already be a Minecraft killer. Then I thought, why not make one myself? So that's what I'm going to do.

This is what it should have: Building and Crafting, Biome Exploration, Lore, Survival, Modding and customization, Waifus.

This is the plan: C++, Lua.
